label: 下剋上
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: A term describing the lower conquering the higher. Although often used to describe the Warring States" turmoil of the sixteenth century, early in the fourteenth century this term was used to criticize how members of the Kamakura bakufu had usurped prerogatives of the court."
